name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Electronics Engineer with 9+ years of specialized experience in PCB design and simulation. Proven expertise in **Siemens** EDA tools, **FPGA** development, and analog-to-digital conversion (**ADC**, **DAC**) techniques. Adept at conducting circuit simulation and ensuring signal integrity in complex electronics projects. Known for implementing DFx principles to enhance product quality and reliability. Combining strong collaborative skills with technical proficiency to lead projects from conception to successful completion, while optimizing performance and efficiency.

Designed, simulated, and verified **FPGA** implementations, achieving functional correctness on the first prototype.
